text: Kiruba Sivasubramaniam from the Electric Machines Laboratory, Niskayuna, NY was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to high power density electric machines for renewable energy and aerospace applications. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kiruba Sivasubramaniam
